Message:
Asahi was more peculiar
than I had anticipated.

She smiles no matter
what I decree...

And even when I try
to act as a princess,
being in her presence
somehow throws me
into disarray.

Ah, yes. I shall try my hand at
granting Asahi the privilege
to call me by name.

In truth, such an act
is unforgivable,
but this is Asahi.
At this moment in time,
not a soul will be concerned.

Then, Asahi and I will form
a link even stronger than
that of a mere shadow and princess...

“I must refuse, my princess.
...For I am but a shadow.”

She smiled in reply,
though tinged with unease.

Ah, I see. In Asahi’s eyes,
I am nothing more
than her master.

Hm. Why doth this vex me now...?
Have I not known this all along?
I am above all lowly shadows.

why do I feel such
pain in my heart...?
